text: Thalamelam is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nissar, starring Kalabhavan Mani and Indraja in the lead role.http://spicyonion.com/title/thalamelam-malayalam-movie/ == Cast == * Kalabhavan Mani as Ramakrishnan * Indraja as Ammukkutty * Jagathy Sreekumar * Innocent * Kalpana * Premkumar * American Achayan * Harishree Ashokan * Janardanan as Kochousepp * Priyanka * Saikumar as C.R Dasan * Salim Kumar * Santhakumari * Master Abul Izzath ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Thalamelam
